title: Gauhati High Court Recruitment 2025 - Apply Online for 02 Multi Tasking Staff Posts
description: The Gauhati High Court has declared the latest job notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for 02 Multi-Tasking Staff Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the 8th, 10th Pass, and 12th can grab this chance and apply for the Gauhati High Court Recruitment 2025 . Here we include the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts. Interested and eligible candidates can apply online through the website on or befo...
